main.*:
'''The Divorce Judge''' appeared in "[[The One With Joey's Porsche]]" portrayed by  [[Conchata Ferrell]].

She oversees [[Ross Geller|Ross]] and [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]]'s possible annulment. When Ross and Rachel apply for an annulment of their Las Vegas wedding, The Judge decides that due to their past history, they don't qualify for an annulment, their cause not helped by Rachel filing false claims in her annulment paper such as Ross being a drug user. This means that Ross and Rachel have to file for divorce.
